name: SideWar
description:
In this game, you must pick a side (RED or BLUE) and fight the other!

Each side would have a random Strength, Speed and health.

IF you pick the stronger side, you win more effortless,  but the weaker your side is, the more score you get if you win!

Move with WASD   shoot with left click

Win as many matches as possible!

Good Luck!

my second submission:

https://itch.io/jam/geojam-2022/rate/1590768
